    • Constructor Detail

      • MoleculeBoundaryInfo

        public MoleculeBoundaryInfo​(java.lang.String aMoleculeName,
                            boolean anIsBoundaryX,
                            double aXmin,
                            double aXmax,
                            boolean anIsBoundaryY,
                            double aYmin,
                            double aYmax,
                            boolean anIsBoundaryZ,
                            double aZmin,
                            double aZmax,
                            int aMaxTimeStep,
                            int aFirstIndex,
                            int aLastIndex)
        Constructor Note: NO checks are performed.
        Parameters:
        aMoleculeName - Name of molecule
        anIsBoundaryX - True: Boundary in x-direction is defined, false: Otherwise
        aXmin - Boundary x-min in simulation box
        aXmax - Boundary x-max in simulation box
        anIsBoundaryY - True: Boundary in y-direction is defined, false: Otherwise
        aYmin - Boundary y-min in simulation box
        aYmax - Boundary y-max in simulation box
        anIsBoundaryZ - True: Boundary in z-direction is defined, false: Otherwise
        aZmin - Boundary z-min in simulation box
        aZmax - Boundary z-max in simulation box
        aMaxTimeStep - Maximum time step for application
        aFirstIndex - First index in particle arrays for molecule
        aLastIndex - Last index in particle arrays for molecule
